description:
Let's face it, trying to find a job can be pretty frustrating!

ARE YOU THINKING ANY OF THESE THOUGHTS?

  • I don’t have the time to find a job!
  • No one ever calls me back!
  • I don’t know where to look?
  • It’s been YEARS since I applied for a job!
  • There aren’t any jobs out there for me!
  • The Hiring Process is SOOOOO long!
  • Recruiters contact me about the wrong kinds of opportunities!
  • I HATE RECRUITERS!

If you have thought any of these things, you are in the right place!

WHAT IS THIS COURSE ABOUT?

In this course, you will learn about the SIX CRITICAL strategies that make up "The LAUNCH System". This system of strategies was specifically developed to help you find better career opportunities and for opportunities to find you!

WHY SHOULD YOU TAKE THIS COURSE?

By the end of this course, you will be able to understand the value that each of these strategies has throughout the hiring process and will learn how to implement them in as little as 30 minutes a day.

BENEFITS OF THE LAUNCH SYSTEM

  • The LAUNCH SYSTEM was developed by Jenn O’Brien and incorporates her extensive knowledge of recruiting and hiring practices!
  • It was developed to meet the needs of job seekers!
  • It reduces the amount of time it takes to GET HIRED!
  • Utilizes current trends in Human Resources
  • Addresses the challenges that job seekers face.
  • Easy to understand!
  • Can be learned in about an hour!
  • Apply it IMMEDIATELY!
  • See results…..FAST!
  • GET HIRED FASTER!

WANT EVEN MORE HELP?
Be among the first to know about Jenn’s new LIVE workshop “The Job Seeker’s Guide to Recruiting” which will provide you will even more assistance in your job search. Topics include finding your Ideal Job, resume writing, interviewing, salary negotiation, and much more! For more information, visit www.jennojobs.com!
title: The 30 Minute Plan to LAUNCH your career!
